ELEMENT.CREATOR: JT
ELEMENT.SHORT: A wide banner, 3 Columns of categories and subcategories and then a text block.
ELEMENT.TITLE: 3 Columns of categories with subcategories
ELEMENT.SUMMARY: This layout features a wide banner at the top, followed by a three column dual-level list of catgories/subcategories. Three subcats from each category are displayed and, if more are present, a 'more' link. The subcat list is followed by a text block. No product list is present in this layout.

ELEMENT.HTML:
<% print(""); loadurp("CSS::zbody.bgcolor"); default("#ffffff"); set($BGCOLOR=>$_); load($cat_thumb); default(""); image(w=>"145",h=>"145",bg=>$BGCOLOR,tag=>"1",alt=>$cat_pretty); print(); %>
<% print($cat_pretty); %>
<% print(""); /* subcats are in a stack that gets popped three times. If more than three subcats are present, a 'more' link is displayed. */ load($cat_safe); default(""); format(pretext=>"NAVCAT::."); pull(stack=>>$CATSTACK,format=>"src",src=>$_); count(stack=>>$CATSTACK); set($STACKCOUNT=>$_); :LOOP(); /* only the first three categories are displayed */ count(stack=>>$CATSTACK); math(op=>"subtract",var=>$STACKCOUNT); math(op=>"multiply",var=>"-1"); goto(label=>"MORE",eq=>"3"); pop(stack=>>$CATSTACK,namespace=>"CAT"); load($CAT.safe); stop(unless=>$_); print("
» "); print($CAT.pretty); print("
"); /* keep looping through the subcats */ goto(nb=>$CATSTACK,label=>"LOOP"); /* if we get past the goto above, there are no cats left to display and we are under 4 total. stop with no 'more' link */ stop(); /* this should only be reached at cat 3 (fourth cat in the loop) */ :MORE(); print("
